languages.text: "После этого на своем корабле, отмеченным знаком серебряной звезды, она путешествовала по мирам, охваченным смутой, и несла надежду верным. Тому есть многочисленные свидетельства. Ее явление людям позволило переломить ход войны и вычистить скверну даже до того, как подоспели основные части имперских сил".

"After that she travelled between worlds gripped by turmoil on her ship marked with a silver star and brought hope to the faithful. Numerous accounts confirm this. Her coming helped people turn the tide of the war and wipe away corruption before the Imperium's main forces even arrived."
languages.original_text: "После этого на своем корабле, отмеченным знаком серебряной звезды, она путешествовала по мирам, охваченным смутой, и несла надежду верным. Тому есть многочисленные свидетельства. Ее явление людям позволило переломить ход войны и вычистить скверну даже до того, как подоспели основные части имперских сил".

traits.locale_text: "Henceforth she traveled between worlds torn by turmoil on her ship marked by a silver star and brought hope to the faithful. Numerous accounts confirm this. Her appearance helped people turn the tide of the war and wipe away the corruption before the main Imperial forces even arrived."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Henceforth she traveled between worlds torn by turmoil on her ship marked by a silver star and brought hope to the faithful. Numerous accounts confirm this. Her appearance helped people turn the tide of the war and wipe away the corruption before the main Imperial forces even arrived."

Her coming helped people turn the tide of the war and wipe away corruption before the main Imperial forces even arrived."

Her coming helped people turn the tide of the war and wipe away corruption before the main Imperial forces even arrived."

traits.locale_text: "After that she travelled between worlds gripped by turmoil on her ship marked with a silver star and brought hope to the faithful. Numerous accounts confirm this. Her coming helped people turn the tide of the war and wipe away corruption before the Imperium's main forces even arrived."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “在那之后，她乘坐着带有银星印记的飞船，穿梭于无数动荡的世界中，给那些世界的虔诚之人带来了希望。许多官方记载都可以证实这样的说法。她的到来帮助当地的人们扭转了战局，让他们赶在帝国主力部队抵达之前就消灭了腐化的痕迹。”
languages.original_text: "After that she travelled between worlds gripped by turmoil on her ship marked with a silver star and brought hope to the faithful. Numerous accounts confirm this. Her coming helped people turn the tide of the war and wipe away corruption before the Imperium's main forces even arrived."

traits.locale_text: “在那之后，她乘坐着带有银星印记的飞船，穿梭于无数动荡的世界中，给那些世界的虔诚之人带来了希望。许多官方记载都可以证实这样的说法。她的到来帮助当地的人们扭转了战局，让他们赶在帝国主力部队抵达之前就消灭了腐化的痕迹。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "After that she travelled between worlds gripped by turmoil on her ship marked with a silver star and brought hope to the faithful. Numerous accounts confirm this. Her coming helped people turn the tide of the war and wipe away corruption before the Imperium's main forces even arrived."

languages.text: «Después viajó por mundos asolados por el conflicto en su nave, marcada con una estrella plateada, y trajo esperanza a los fieles. Hay numerosos relatos que lo confirman. Su llegada ayudó a la gente a cambiar las tornas de la guerra y erradicar la corrupción antes de que las principales fuerzas del Imperium llegaran».
languages.original_text: "After that she travelled between worlds gripped by turmoil on her ship marked with a silver star and brought hope to the faithful. Numerous accounts confirm this. Her coming helped people turn the tide of the war and wipe away corruption before the Imperium's main forces even arrived."

traits.locale_text: «Después viajó por mundos asolados por el conflicto en su nave, marcada con una estrella plateada, y trajo esperanza a los fieles. Hay numerosos relatos que lo confirman. Su llegada ayudó a la gente a cambiar las tornas de la guerra y erradicar la corrupción antes de que las principales fuerzas imperiales llegaran».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「その後、彼女は銀の星をしるした船で混乱に満ちた世界を行き来し、信者に希望をもたらした。多くの証言がそれを裏付けている。彼女の来訪により、人々は戦争の流れを変え、帝国軍の本隊が到着する前に腐敗を一掃することができたのだ」
languages.original_text: "After that she travelled between worlds gripped by turmoil on her ship marked with a silver star and brought hope to the faithful. Numerous accounts confirm this. Her coming helped people turn the tide of the war and wipe away corruption before the Imperium's main forces even arrived."

traits.locale_text: 「その後、彼女は銀の星をしるした船で混乱に満ちた世界を行き来し、信者に希望をもたらした。多くの証言がそれを裏付けている。彼女の来訪により、人々は戦争の流れを変え、帝国軍の本隊が到着する前に腐敗を一掃することができたのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Danach flog sie auf ihrem mit einem silbernen Stern verzierten Schiff von einer gepeinigten Welt zur nächsten und brachte den Gläubigen Hoffnung. Das bestätigen zahlreiche Berichte. Ihre Ankunft half, das Blatt des Krieges zu wenden und jede Verderbtheit fortzufegen, bevor die Haupttruppen des Imperiums überhaupt nur eintrafen."
languages.original_text: "After that she travelled between worlds gripped by turmoil on her ship marked with a silver star and brought hope to the faithful. Numerous accounts confirm this. Her coming helped people turn the tide of the war and wipe away corruption before the Imperium's main forces even arrived."

traits.locale_text: "Danach flog sie auf ihrem mit einem silbernen Stern verzierten Schiff von einer gepeinigten Welt zur nächsten und brachte den Gläubigen Hoffnung. Das bestätigen zahlreiche Berichte. Ihre Ankunft half, das Blatt des Krieges zu wenden und jede Verderbtheit fortzufegen, bevor die Haupttruppen des Imperiums eintrafen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Par la suite, elle a entrepris des voyages mouvementés à travers les mondes, à bord de son vaisseau marqué d'une étoile argentée dans le but de redonner espoir aux fidèles. De nombreux témoignages s'accordent là-dessus. Sa présence a aidé à renverser le cours de la guerre et à éradiquer la corruption avant même l'arrivée des forces de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "After that she travelled between worlds gripped by turmoil on her ship marked with a silver star and brought hope to the faithful. Numerous accounts confirm this. Her coming helped people turn the tide of the war and wipe away corruption before the Imperium's main forces even arrived."

traits.locale_text: « Par la suite, elle a entrepris des voyages mouvementés à travers les mondes, à bord de son vaisseau marqué d'une étoile argentée dans le but de redonner espoir aux fidèles. De nombreux témoignages s'accordent là-dessus. Sa présence a aidé à renverser le cours de la guerre et à éradiquer la corruption avant même l'arrivée des forces impériales. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Sonrasında yıldız işaretli gemisiyle kargaşaya sürüklenmiş dünyaları gezerek inananlara umut kaynağı olmuş. Birçok farklı kaynakta bu bilgiler tasdik ediliyor. Gelişiyle savaşın seyri değişmiş ve İmparatorluk kuvvetlerinin asıl kolu daha gelmeden yozlaşmanın önünü kesmiş."
languages.original_text: "After that she travelled between worlds gripped by turmoil on her ship marked with a silver star and brought hope to the faithful. Numerous accounts confirm this. Her coming helped people turn the tide of the war and wipe away corruption before the Imperium's main forces even arrived."

traits.locale_text: "Sonrasında yıldız işaretli gemisinde kargaşaya sürüklenmiş dünyaları gezerek inananlara umut kaynağı olmuş. Birçok farklı kaynakta bu bilgiler tasdik ediliyor. Gelişiyle savaşın seyri değişmiş ve İmparatorluk kuvvetlerinin asıl kolu daha gelmeden yozlaşmanın önünü kesmiş."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
